ygData.subject: Re: errors when maven dist
ygData.msgSnippet: I have no net connection problem. I ve set maven.proxy.host, maven.proxy.port, and maven.repo.remote=http://public.planetmirror.com/pub/maven. And correctly

I have no net connection problem.
I've set maven.proxy.host, maven.proxy.port, and
maven.repo.remote=http://public.planetmirror.com/pub/maven. And
correctly downloaded some jars before compiling.

--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, stack <stack@a...> wrote:
> bjhong02 wrote:
> 
> >I download the source code of heritrix 1.0, and build it successfully
> >with maven jar, the os is Redhat linux 9.0.
> >But when I use maven dist, the build is failed. I'm a beginner in this
> >area, could someone tell me how to correct it.
> >
> >the follows are the errors in the building process.
> >
> >...
> >
> >    [echo] Generating the Change Log...
> >maven-changelog-plugin:report:
> >    [echo] Generating the changelog report
> >Could not read password for
> >':pserver:anonymous@c...:/cvsroot/archive-crawler' from
> >'/home/blue/.cvspass'
> >java.io.FileNotFoundException: /home/blue/.cvspass (No such file or
> >directory)
> >
> >...
> >  
> >
> The maven changelog report needs to log into cvs to get a list of
recent 
> changes otherwise its generation fails.   Do a cvs login or, just read 
> the report up on crawler.archive.org (Its non-generation doesn't stop 
> the dist package working).
> 
> >                                                                     
> >          
> >docbook:
> >sdocbook:prepare-filesystem:
> >xdoc:init:
> >                                                                     
> >                                                                     
> >                    
> >    [mkdir] Created dir: home/blue/heritrix-1.0.0/target/docs/articles
> >                                                                     
> >                                                                     
> >                    
> >sdocbook:generate-html:
> >    [mkdir] Created dir:
> >/home/blue/heritrix-1.0.0/target/generated-docbooks/html
> >    [echo] Processing
> >/home/blue/heritrix-1.0.0/src/articles/user_manual.xml
> >    [java]
> >    [java] (Location of error unknown) XSLT Error
> >(javax.xml.transform.TransformerException):
> >java.net.NoRouteToHostException: No route to host
> >    [java] [ERROR] Java Result: 255
> >    [java] (Location of error unknown) XSLT Error
> >(javax.xml.transform.TransformerException):
> >java.net.NoRouteToHostException: No route to host
> >    [java] [ERROR] Java Result: 255
> >    [echo] Processing
> >  
> >
> The docbook transform is looking to go out on the net to find a 
> referenced stylesheet.  Are you having net connection problems?
> 
> St.Ack
